author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

Until the job report finishes, we add a FrameworkError element to denote that if the job suddenly ends the error will be present. When job completes successfully or with another error, that temporary element is not written. The new error was added to edm::errors.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, framework unit tests pass.
NOTE: some of the unit test results had to be changed from the original PR. Reason unknown.

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41124. Needed for workflow management parsing of framework job reports.
title: Add temporary failure element to Framework Job Report [12_6]
